item.title: How to Prepare for Microsoft Azure Certifications
item.description: Azure Spring Clean 2023 This special blog post is part of the amazing Azure Spring Clean 2023 event organised by the awesome Joe Carlyle and Thomas Thornton. Microsoft Azure certifications have many benefits, including the potential to get your first job working with Azure, earn a promotion, keeping your skills up to date, and having greater job satisfaction. In this session, we’ll cover which certifications are available, learning resources, exams and renewals, money-saving tips and much more!
